channel.title: SPARQL Cheat Sheet on SPARQL 1.1 Cheat Sheet
channel.description: Recent content in SPARQL Cheat Sheet on SPARQL 1.1 Cheat Sheet

item.title: SELECT
item.description: PREFIX # PREFIX ab: <http://learningsparql.com/ns/addressbook#> SELECT ?craigEmail WHERE { ab:craig ab:email ?craigEmail } LIMIT # SELECT ?s ?p ?o WHERE { ?s ?p ?o } LIMIT 10 Multiple Constraints # PREFIX ab: <http://learningsparql.com/ns/addressbook#> SELECT ?first ?last WHERE { ?person ab:homeTel "(229) 276-5135" . ?person ab:firstName ?first . ?person ab:lastName ?last . } Using ; # PREFIX ab: <http://learningsparql.com/ns/addressbook#> SELECT ?first ?last WHERE { ?person ab:homeTel "(229) 276-5135" ; ab:firstName ?

item.title: CONSTRUCT
item.description: Creates a new RDF graph. CONSTRUCT { ?person vcard:fn ?fullName } WHERE { ?person vcard:given-name ?givenName . ?person vcard:family-name ?familyName . BIND(concat(?givenName, " ", ?familyName) as ?fullName) }

item.title: INSERT
item.description: Adds triples to a graph. INSERT DATA # PREFIX ns: <https://example.org/ns#> INSERT DATA { GRAPH <https://example/bookStore> { <https://example/book1> ns:price 42 . } } INSERT # PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1> PREFIX eg: <http://example.org/ns#> INSERT { ?person eg:something eg:someone } WHERE { ?person ?property ?value ; foaf:givenName "Fred"@en . }

item.title: DELETE
item.description: DELETE DATA # PREFIX ns: <https://example.org/ns#> DELETE DATA { GRAPH <https://example/bookStore> { <https://example/book1> dct:title "Fundamentals of Compiler Desing"@en . } } DELETE # PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1> DELETE { ?person ?property ?value } WHERE { ?person ?property ?value ; foaf:givenName "Fred"@en . } DELETE { GRAPH <g1> { a b c }} INSERT { GRAPH <g1> { x y z }} USING <g1> WHERE { ... } DELETE WHERE # DELETE WHERE { ?

item.title: ASK
item.description: Returns Yes or No depending on whether the query has a solution. PREFIX dbpedia: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> ASK WHERE { dbpedia:The_Beatles mo:member dbpedia:Paul_McCartney }

item.title: DESCRIBE
item.description: Returns the RDF graph data about a resource. PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> DESCRIBE ?ford WHERE { ?ford foaf:name "FORD MOTOR CO" . }

item.title: Graph Management
item.description: LOAD <file> INTO GRAPH <g1> CLEAR GRAPH <g1> CLEAR DEFAULT CLEAR ALL CLEAR NAMED CREATE GRAPH <g1> DROP GRAPH <g1> COPY GRAPH <g1> TO DEFAULT MOVE GRAPH <g1> TO DEFAULT ADD DEFAULT TO GRAPH <g1> # adds all triples from source graph to target graph
